titleInfo.title: Latin glossary : small manuscript fragment on vellum

mods.abstract: Unidentified Latin vocabulary, this portion part of the letter M, with a total of 35 lemmata (a word or phrase that is glossed; headword).
mods.note: Lower portion of vellum leaf, removed from a binding.
Script: professional gotica textualis, 2 columns, with a fair amount of abbreviations.
Previously in the Bernard M. Rosenthal collection; with Rosenthal's dealer description included with the manuscript, together with a note re previous ownership of Bernard Bischoff.

location.physicalLocation: Department of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, CA 94305

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Converted from MARCXML to MODS version 3.4 using MARC21slim2MODS3-4_SDR.xsl (Version 1.2.5 2013/08/11)

titleInfo.title: Stanford University Libraries Special Collections, Manuscripts Division

mods.accessCondition: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Special Collections Public Services Librarian at speccollref@stanford.edu.
